description: Used for bulk updating receiver session descriptions
title: Receiver Session Description Bulk Update

items.description: ID of a receiver to have its transport parameters updated

data.description: string providing connection and stream format parameters. If provided, the information contained in this string will override all user-configuration of parameters in the transport_params.  For RTP receivers, this string will be in SDP format

by_reference.description: data provides a reference to the session_description string rather than the data itself
